At least 02-03 year-experience in relevant position1.Other skills:    1.Communication, Problem solving   2.Presentation and negotiation   3.Analysis/reporting    4.Training/ encouraging   5.Project managing, Leadership   6.Interpersonal skill   7.Staffing2.Other skills:     1.English Speaking   2.High commitment and flexibility   3.Field Coaching Skill   4.Have great passion in FMCG.* Send your CV and Cover Letter to our email : recruitment@winsuncambodia.com and CC Email to  ponlok.noeun@taisun.com.vn For more information, you may contact us via phone line: 010 756 508 | 015 337 375​
Company Profile:
Winsun Cambodia is a proud member of the Taisun Holding Group and has secured its position as the leader of the Cambodian hygiene products market. With our most well-known diaper brands UniDry and SunMate, we have been offering a sound solution to personal health and hygiene to families across all of Cambodia.
We have over 20 years of experience in the personal hygiene industry and are constantly finding innovative technological solutions to elevate our product quality and benefits. Started as the first diaper manufacturer in Cambodia, we now offer a full scope of hygiene products including baby diapers, adult incontinence products, sanitary pads for ladies, wet wipes, and face masks.

Even though we have become the number one brand in Cambodia, we never forgot what got us here. Our core value “Growing Together” is so much more than just a saying. We sincerely believe that for our business to thrive we must also take good care of all of our stakeholders. We are an active promoter of clean energy and a regular donor to struggling communities all over Southeast Asia.
-Our Mission: To be one of the best solution providers for premium hygiene & natural products.
-Our Vision: To be the leading manufacturer of hygiene products & services in Asia through sustainable development.
General Overview of Winsun:

-120 employees at Winsun Cambodia
-More than 22 years of experience in the industry
-Export business spans across 20 countries worldwide
-Total of 8 product categories, maintaining the ratio of 70% OBM and 30% OEM.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Snuol Chanbol  010 756 508 | 015 337 375   recruitment@winsuncambodia.com National Road No.4, Khan Posen Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 756 508 | 015 337 375

company_name: Tech Seng Supply All Kind of Steels Co.,Ltd
Job Description:
-Optimize plan orders by considering minimum order quantity, full container load, lead time, and safety stock. 
-To work closely with sale team and other stakeholders on steel and ceramics material start operation purchasing to ensure continuity in supply. 
-Communicate and coordinate with sales or vendors to re-act faster in case that materials are urgently needed to fulfil the demand plan. 
-Study and analyze historical actual sale quantities to predict estimated future demand for plan orders. 
-Simulate material requirement planning and demand if any constraint related to shipment, plan orders, or storage space. 
-Prepare latest forecast of demand quantity and send it to Vendor and S&OP on regular basis.
Job Requirement:
• At least 1-3 years of experience in Purchase or Procurement  or a related area.
• Bachelor’s degree in business administration or a related field. 
• Business management. 
• Operational and reporting. 
• Supply planning. 
• Working with challenges.

Job Description:
• Prepare daily cash and cheque collection reports for immediate supervisor. 
• Ensure all invoices, cash and cheques are collected on time. 
• Maintain and keep daily cash and cheque collection reports properly and safely. 
• Deposit collected cash and cheques to banks on time. 
• Deliver payment statements to customers 
• Work collaboratively with Accounts Receivable officers and salespersons to deal with customer complaints. 
• File the delay date of payment and report any issue with customers to the Accounting team. 
• Perform other duties as assigned.

• At least 1 years of experience in Account Receivable or a related area.
• Knowledge of Finance and Accounting 
• Knowledge of company business
• Proficiency in Microsoft word and Excel
• Good spoken and written communication skills in Khmer and English
• Good time management skills
• Good interpersonal and problem solving skills
• Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
• Ability to think creatively and innovatively
• Ability to work under pressure
. Flexible to travel

Company Profile:
Winsun Cambodia is a proud member of the Taisun Holding Group and has secured its position as the leader of the Cambodian hygiene products market. With our most well-known diaper brands UniDry and SunMate, we have been offering a sound solution to personal health and hygiene to families across all of Cambodia.
We have over 20 years of experience in the personal hygiene industry and are constantly finding innovative technological solutions to elevate our product quality and benefits. Started as the first diaper manufacturer in Cambodia, we now offer a full scope of hygiene products including baby diapers, adult incontinence products, sanitary pads for ladies, wet wipes, and face masks.

Even though we have become the number one brand in Cambodia, we never forgot what got us here. Our core value “Growing Together” is so much more than just a saying. We sincerely believe that for our business to thrive we must also take good care of all of our stakeholders. We are an active promoter of clean energy and a regular donor to struggling communities all over Southeast Asia.
-Our Mission: To be one of the best solution providers for premium hygiene & natural products.
-Our Vision: To be the leading manufacturer of hygiene products & services in Asia through sustainable development.
General Overview of Winsun:

-120 employees at Winsun Cambodia
-More than 22 years of experience in the industry
-Export business spans across 20 countries worldwide
-Total of 8 product categories, maintaining the ratio of 70% OBM and 30% OEM.

job title: Head of Brand at a Leading Group of Company in Phnom Penh
position: Head of Brand at a Leading Group of Company in Phnom Penh
Job Description: The RoleAmazing opportunity for well-experienced Brand manager who is looking for a challenging and rewarding career. Our client is looking for a seasoned individual to join their team in Cambodia.About the CompanyOur client is a thriving organization who has a satisfied workforce focus on building an intentional company culture by consistently improving employee engagement, communication, and trust.Description● Developing franchise expansion, brand support, and Sales operation● Review and provide geographical insights to enhance franchise operations and decisions● Working closely with cross-functional teams to implement best franchise practices and initiatives● Provide continuous franchise leadership to Franchise Teams and Partners related to leadership and successful operations management● Ensure franchise compliance by implementing/improving SOP and assessment standards anddevelop appropriate corrective action plans, milestones, and timelines
Job Requirement: Requirements● At least 10 years of experience in F&B Franchise industry and at least 3 years of experience in marketing management level● Bachelor’s degree holder and other related qualification will be advantaged● Business English is a must● Has excellent market knowledge and communications management● Open for the expatriate candidate.BenefitsBasic salary and other allowancesCareer Growth OpportunitiesAlong with the development of company’s business, there are a lot of ambitious growth plans to become an expert in your field.
Company Profile:
About Us

Bringing to Cambodia never before seen quality, customer service and sophistication, MyWorld is the region’s No. 1 recruitment and staffing agency. With our team of 50+ recruitment professionals who are experts in their specialist field, we are able to provide our clients and candidates with the best advice on recruitment activities and careers in Cambodia.
For companies: Our goal is to provide access to more qualified bilingual candidates.

Working with Cambodia’s top local and international companies, MyWorld is the best choice to solve your recruitment and staffing needs. We provide the following types of recruitment and staffing services:
Executive Search

Payroll Outsourcing Services
Contract And Outsourced Staffing Solutions
Founded in 2015, MyWorld quickly became recognized as one of the region’s top recruitment and staffing agencies. job title: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់ (Sales Supervisor), 2 Positions
position: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់ (Sales Supervisor), 2 Positions
Job Description:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយការលក់ និងលក់ផលិតផល តាមតំបន់ចាត់តាំងដើម្បីសម្រេចបានតាមផែនការលក់ដែលបានកំណត់។
- ចុះជួបអតិថិជន  ទទួលការកម្មង់ និងការឆ្លើយតបពីអតិថិជន ឬអ្នកប្រើប្រាស់។ 
- តាមដានព័ត៌មានទីផ្សារដៃគូរប្រកួតប្រជែង និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មតាមតម្រូវការអតិថិជន។ 
- រៀបចំកាលវិភាគការងារ និងធ្វើរផែនការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ។ 
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានរយៈពេលនៃការធានាបន្ទាប់ពីបានលក់ផលិតផលជូនអតិថិជន។ 
- ចូលរួមពិភាក្សាក្នុងការរៀបចំដាក់ផែនការលក់ យុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ និងការអនុវត្តន៍ផែនការទីផ្សារ និងលក់។ 
- ធ្វើការណាត់ជួប និងទៅជួបអតិថិជនគោលដៅជាចាំបាច់។ 
- ស្វែងរកអតិថិជនថ្មី និងថែរក្សាអតិថិជនចាស់ឲ្យបានល្អ។ 
- សម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាអោយអតិថិជន។ 
- អនុវត្តន៍ការងារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការលក់ផ្សេងទៀត ដែលចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់។
Job Requirement:
- បពា្ចប់ ឬកំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ បរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង សេដ្ឋិកិច្ច និងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬជំនាញដែលទាក់ទងផ្សេងៗ។ 
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Ms. Word & Excel។ 
- មានសមត្ថភាព និងបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់កាន់តែប្រសើរ។ 
- មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការលក់ ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។ 
- ចេះធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ របាយការណ៍ការងារសង្ខេបប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងរបាយការណ៍ការងារសរុបប្រចាំខែ។ 
- មានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម ស្មោះត្រង់ និងអំណត់នឹងការងារ។ 
- មានភាពរហ័សរហួន រួសរាយ រាក់ទាក់ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ។
- អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងមានភាពបត់បែនទៅតាមកាលះទេសះ។ 
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារ អតិថិជន និងរក្សាការទំនាក់ទំនងឲ្យបានកាន់តែល្អប្រសើរ។
Company Profile: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ហ្វៀធ័រប្រូ ជាក្រុមហ៊ុននាំចូលផលិតផលចម្រោះទឹកប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងផ្ទះ បច្ចេកវិទ្យារបស់ប្រទេសបារាំងដំបូងគេនៅកម្ពុជា។

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.

Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.

Job Description: About the JobTo assist Project Officer, Project Supervisor on site coordination with suppliers & contractors, responsible for coordination with supplier and operation team about daily work and outstanding jobs, reporting to Supervisor, To breakdown detail schedule and job with Supplier to plan 1 or 2 days ahead, and to report to Supervisor if any job will be delayed. What You Will Do-To help Project Officer to deal suppliers and follow up for daily progress and outstanding jobs related project.-To join daily/weekly meeting with brewery team, Suppliers, and contractors.-To coordinate and update among internal project equipment and Civil team.-To organize Safety induction with all contractors, suppliers, and sub-suppliers before starting work. And all safety rule must apply.-To solve onsite issues if possible, reporting daily project on site.-To update and align all outstanding information of project to other related parties. Focusing to deal until completion.-To take notes the importance tasks, coordinating with project management team (3rd parties) or Suppliers to complete on site.-To order materials related project if required.-To arrange/coordinate transportation car, truck, crane, tools as contractors’, suppliers’ requirement.-To ensure that all contractors and suppliers commit to enforce the standard operation procedure, safety, 5S, housekeeping, and site cleaning regularly.-To control casual workers to complete his jobs with disciplinary.To check passports and visa validate for all foreigner contractors and suppliers.-To work closely with Officer/Supervisor about delivered shipment schedule with agreed location, unloading area with suppliers.-To ensure method statement, work-permit, technical specification to be applied on site.-To check MEP work on site and follow up with contractors.-To check attendance of casual workers and crane, trucks, reporting to purchasing team for payment.-To check validate certificate of welders and skill of welders by doing sample test:  all position 0°, 45°, and 90° before approval. -To ensure that all welding pipes, HDPE pipe, must be done with pressure test according to technical specification and testing procedure with suppliers and third-party.-Check quality grinding, polishing of all welding points and welding seam quality after completion.-All documents—installation drawing, maintenance, operation, spare parts…. etc. to hand over to engineering department and plant owner by asking from Suppliers.-To ensure that all sorts of work permit (hot work/confine space…etc.)  are applied during installation, working and renew.
Job Requirement: What You Should Have-Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical, Electrical, manufacturing industry, Business operation or a related field.-Basic knowledge of packaging machines, syrup machines and utility machines (Production).-Basic knowledge of the brewing non brewer process-1.5 years experiences in project/manufacturing environment or 2 years at least working in Brewery is preferred -Good English Proficiency-Microsoft word, Excel and PowerPoint program, and Email.-Auto Cad, Solid Works, Sketch up program is a plus-Good communication skills, initiative, flexible, enthusiastic-Flexibility to work on over time/holiday and standby on emergency calls 24 hrs related project. What You Get From UsWe offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including Seniority payment, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.

Company Profile:
SpringBoard4Cambodia is found in 2007 and officially registered in Cambodia in 2008. We operate as a Social Enterprise, with surplus from commercial activities being used for education related CSR (corporate social responsibilities) project in Cambodia such as building school in remote communities, funding English speaking and debating society, funding women entrepreneurship events, funding the British Alumni Association of Cambodia, funding exchange students program with partner’s university/college..etc. 

SpringBoard4Cambodia’s main commercial objectives are to promote international education in the UK, English language training through the British English Learning Centre, Campus UK, and Examination services for the Cambridge English Languages Assessment, University of Cambridge and IELTS test of the British Council. Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. Job Description: Product Load ExecutiveDo you love data accuracy and quality control?Have you a talent for extracting, transforming and loading data?Are ready to build and lead a high performing team?If this excites you then read on!About the OpportunityDiscova is looking for a Product Loading Executive to join the team in Siem Reap, Cambodia. Your role is to manage a high performing product loading that have assigned. You will be responsible for the accurate load and maintenance of products in Discova’s system and ensure that a one best way of load is followed through. This includes all product types, hotels, transfers, sightseeing day trips, pre-packaged tours, cruise etc. The role is suited to someone with a high attention to detail, experience in managing teams (including virtually) and an excellent communicator.Key Responsibilities:Ensure product load is done accurately and to the agreed one best way across the company to optimize output.Review reporting requirements to assist in both Review reporting requirements to assist in both accuracy of the load and analyzing data to improve efficiencies.Manage workflow of incoming contracts, specials and promotions to increase speed to market.Uploading correct hotel & supplier rates, contracts & promotions into the system in a timely manner.Ensure contract rates/information; promotional deals and allotment are updated accurately on all platforms: Tourplan/Webconnect/Tocco/Hotelhub.Responsible for training (face to face and virtually) on the load of products and any new process related to the load to team members but also other departments. Taking direction from the Content and Connectivity Manager and Product Load Team Leader ensure that the load team support all connectivity projects.Thrive in an environment where the research, testing and implementation increases productivity and reduces risks and operating costs.Professional and friendly in dealing with internal business and external suppliers.Collaborate with the key business and technical business partners to successfully implement processes and outcomes within each project.About you:The Essentials:3 years related work experience in travel/tour industryGood command of both written and spoken EnglishExperience working in an environment requiring the transfer of complex information, including: Capture of information, active listening etc.Dissemination of information via written communicationExposure to travel systems such that there is an understanding of the complexities of global booking systemsExperience with large organizations and project environmentsExperience working as a representative of a system, process, or business, such that the candidate can be authoritative on a subject to peers and senior management.The Skill and Attributes:High proficiency with Microsoft Office applications, notably excel.Tourplan front and back office system/s knowledge (preferable)Results Orientated and high attention to details.Excellent communicator to a diverse range of people (team members, leaders). Solution focused and great at problem solving.Able to work independently and within a team assisting team members to help everyone achieve results.Flexible rotating roster that may include late nights, weekends and early mornings and flexible with uncertainties/changing priorities and under pressure.Willing to travel on business when required.Personally, aligned with Discova’s company purpose and values.

-	Responsible for page action for both Comment and Messenger to generate the sales lead
-	Provide warm welcome customer walk-in & agent’s customer
-	Consult with customer regarding our product and opportunity cost after product purchase 
-	Coordinate with Customer Service Department for customer concern or problem
-	Prepare report daily, weekly, and monthly submit to supervisor
-	Other tasks per line manager’s assign
Job Requirement:
-	Degree educated in Marketing /Economics or relevant experience 
-	Prior experience at least 2 years from Real Estate or Insurance company
-	Prior experience at least 3 years from Sales Experience
-	Very good interpersonal and communication skills.
-	Good in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)

job title: ផែ្នករដ្ឋបាល​
position: ផែ្នករដ្ឋបាល​
Job Description:
*​ តួនាទី៖
- ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកតាមតម្រូវការបុគ្កលិក
- គ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិក
- គ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារះការិយាល័យនិងត្រួតពិនិត្យអនាម័យ
- បូកសរុប និងវាយតម្លៃលទ្ធផលការងារលើផ្នេកផ្សេងៗ
- ប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Office ( Word , Excel , Power Point)
- ការងារផ្សេងៗចាត់ចែងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
- មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង​រដ្ឋបាល និងផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងមនុស្ស​​ រឺសញ្ញាប័ត្រមានតម្លៃស្មើ
-​ ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ចាប់ពី2ឆ្នាំឡើង
* លក្ខខណ្ឌការងារ​៖
- ម៉ោងធ្វើរការ​ពីថ្ងៃច័ន្ទ ដល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ចាប់ពីម៉ោង 8:00 ព្រឹក ដល់ 5:00ល្ងាច
- មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ប្រឹងប្រែងក្នុងការងារ​
- ប្រាក់បៀរវត្សចរចាតាមសម្ថភាព
* ទីតាំង​៖​អាគារលេខ 419 សង្កាត់បឺងទំពុន ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
- ទូរស័ព្ទលេខ៖ 096 4991680

Sourcing and verifying the product • Collaborate with business teams to understand and suggest best & efficient solution to cater to business needs• Liaise with suppliers for new Software and Application• Source new Technologies in the innovation process3. Manage and lean team with effective • Enhancement and maintenance application• Ensure the application management functions aligned with company strategy• Analyze problems and implement appropriate technical solutions• Prepare the technical specification • Define and document scope changes during the project life cycle• Collaborate with Operations to achieve project objectives.• Approve Labels to ensure compliance with regulations.• Identifies and advances quality and process improvement opportunities.• Keep current with changes in technologies and regulation for the countries where we do business.• Lead and mentor direct reports while providing developmental opportunities when available.• Other tasks resigned by management
Job Requirement: 1. កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification• Bachelor/Master degree in field of computer science or related field2. បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge• At least 4 years of experience with system and network development• Working experiences in real estate• Experience with high level PHP and Laravel Framework• Understanding of Restful API web service• Understanding of Databases MySQL, MS SQL• Understand trendy design model patterns such at least MVC as an application of OOP• Understanding on Database Design and Analysis• Understanding on SOLID principles or Clean Code• Knowledge with online payment gateway and third-party service integrate• Experience with Loan System• Knowledge with cloud server (Linux)• Basic Knowledge with Agile Development is a plus• Basic Knowledge with DevOps and tools such as Jira, Git Repository and Pipeline, or Jenkins is a plus• Basic Knowledge with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central3. ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills• Knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle• Software Development• Web Development• Mobile Application Development• Understanding on Database Design and Analysis• Understanding of Databases MySQL, MS SQL• Knowledge HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax, Json• Knowledge PHP and Laravel Framework• Understanding of Restful API web service• Basic Knowledge with DevOps and tools such as Jira, Git Repository and Pipeline, or Jenkins is a plus• PHP Security• React native, Flutter	4. ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills• Analytical and problem-solving skills• Eager to learn and gain new experiences (curious person with passion)• Hard working, patient and be able to work under pressure and complete as deadline• Honestly, Friendly, morality, and high responsible for works• Be a fast learner, smart, flexible, creative person & team player

job title: ផ្នែករៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ​
position: ផ្នែករៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ​
Job Description:
* តួនាទី៖
- វិភាគតម្រូវការទីផ្សារ
- រៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តបង្កើនការលក់
- រៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល​(​Promotion)
- ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតចាត់ចែងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
- មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច​ គ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជរឺជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ចាប់ពី ២ ឆ្នាំឡើង
* លក្ខខណ្ឌការងារ​៖
- ម៉ោងធ្វើរការ​ពីថ្ងៃច័ន្ទ ដល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ចាប់ពីម៉ោង 8:00 ព្រឹក ដល់ 5:00ល្ងាច
- មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ប្រឹងប្រែងក្នុងការងារ​
- ប្រាក់បៀរវត្សចរចាតាមសម្ថភាព
* ទីតាំង​៖​អាគារលេខ 419 សង្កាត់បឺងទំពុន ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
- ទូរស័ព្ទលេខ៖ 096 4991680  
- Email : tbs.cambodian@gmail.com
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  096 499 1680 tbs.cambodia@gmail.com Phnom Penh 096 499 1680

Job Description:
1.     Operation Management 
Ensure that Operation are running smooth:
1.1  Service: Manage and Make sure that all Machinery are ready to operate for Casting Concrete.
1.1.1      Mixer Truck
1.1.2      Pump Truck
1.1.3      Pump Machine
1.1.4      Wheel Loader
1.2  Productions: Make sure that Mix machine and peoples are ready to produce concrete on time.
1.2.1      Concrete Mixer
1.2.2      Assistant Concrete Mixer
1.2.3      Mix Machine
1.3  Quality Controller: Make sure that the quality of concrete is under control.
1.3.1      Before depart from factory
1.3.2      During casting at site
1.3.3      After casting at site
1.4  Laboratory: Make sure that the testing results of concrete are prepare and issue the report after casting at site.
1.4.1      Testing period: 7days, 14days, 28days …
1.4.2      Testing report from compressive machine
1.4.3      Report from excel by acknowledge from Management.
1.5  Workshop: Repair and Maintenance
1.5.1      Repair: Make sure the machinery is repairing on time, especially once the problem occurs at site
1.5.2      Maintenance: All machinery must have a regular schedule for checkup for maintenance.
1.6  Warehouse: Stock/Inventory
1.6.1      General Materials: Make sure stock movement is OK
1.6.2      Raw Materials: Make sure stock movement is OK and the quantity are maintaining for safety stock

2.     Report Review   
2.1  Review on Daily Production report from mix machine with actual casting
2.2  Review on Daily sale report
2.3  Review on Stock/Inventory report: Raw materials & General Materials
2.4  Review on QC & Labor report
2.5  Review on OT report
2.6  Review on Repair and Maintenance report  

3.     Preparation and Submission
3.1  Prepare and Testing Trail mix with review on mix design

4.     Others
4.1  Document’s control
4.2  Provide training to subordinate related to operation process/work flow
4.3  Schedule to Clean the factory area
4.4  Other’s task is assigned by management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Business Management or any related field 
- Over 2 years of work experience in Operation.
- 2-4 years of work experience in Supervisor level
- Fluent in English Language
- MS Office & Email
- Operation System
- Strong skills in Operation Management,
- Strong knowledge in Process Improvement & Cost Saving
- Strong knowledge in project management, planning skills
- Excellence in communication, problem solving and interpersonal skills
- Effective team and relationship building
- Strong knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
- Good at strategic and critical thinking skills

Job Description:
•	Assist in monitoring and analyzing market trends to maximize brand awareness
•	Assist in creating and developing new advertising concepts and drafting art work to deliver marketing massage to the target customers.
•	Assist in Planning, developing and organizing advertising guideline and campaigns to support sales objectives
•	Manage online marketing campaign and response to enquiries on Social Network (Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube Etc
•	Perform other tasks assigned by line manager
•	Assists Head of Sale & Marketing in developing marketing plans and strategies for all digital channels
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration or a similar skill
•	At least 2 or more years of work experience of marketing with Media / real estate industry 
•	Have good knowledge of marketing techniques and concepts
•	Work well in a team and be well presented with a professional manner
•	High ability to communicate in English and others language is an advantage
•	Proposal initiative and research skills and able to maintain confidentiality

Job Description:
Key Responsible 
-	Make a cold calling to target clients and have a face to face meeting 
-	Responsible for sales calls to prospective or current customer
-	Responsible for page action for both Comment and Messenger to generate the sales lead
-	Provide warm welcome customer walk-in & agent’s customer
-	Consult with customer regarding our product and opportunity cost after product purchase 
-	Coordinate with Customer Service Department for customer concern or problem
-	Prepare report daily, weekly, and monthly submit to supervisor
-	Other tasks per line manager’s assign
Job Requirement:
Requirement
-	Degree educated in Marketing /Economics or relevant experience 
-	Prior experience at least 2 years from Real Estate or Insurance company
-	Prior experience at least 3 years from Sales Experience
-	Very good interpersonal and communication skills.
-	Good in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)

Job Description:
• Support team and response for any issue related to network, server system, CCTV, VoIP system.
• Support as secondary line for user request.
• Play role as primary contact for any system related network and system incident, keep record and follow up.
• Setup onboard staff for related IT matter.
• On site setup and support for infra related matter.
• Perform inspection and root course any faulty related to IT network and server system.
• Perform inspection and root course of any IT related incident.
• Keep tracking IT fixed asset record.
• Other appointed work scope by manager or direct supervisor.
Job Requirement: • University Degree in IT or another related field is preferred. • At least 1 years working experience in IT administrative work.• Experience on Mikrotik, CiSCO device (routing and switching)• Experience on VMware ESXi 6 plus.• Experience on VMware backup methodology is a plus. • Experience in dealing with internal & external IT issues.• Knowledge of basic IT hardware and software.• Good in communication and interpersonal skills and flexible

Job Description: •	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានអគារ-ផ្ទះទាំងអស់ដែលកំពុងសាងសង់ ជាមួយក្រុមសាងសង ក្រុមមេជាង ឬក្រុមវិស្វករ-ល-។•	ជម្រុញ និងពន្លឿនក្រុមសាងសង់ ឬក្រុមវិស្វករតាមកាលកំណក់ ។ •	ត្រួតពិនិត្យរាល់បញ្ហាបច្ចេកទេស គ្រប់ផ្នែក គ្រប់ជាន់ គ្រប់ប្រព័ន្ធ ផ្សេងៗ ពេលទទួលបានអគារ-ផ្ទះដំបូង (សងរួចភ្លាម)។•	កត់ត្រារាល់បញ្ហាបច្ចេកទេស ដែលបានកើតមានពេលកំពុងត្រួតពិនិត្យ ដោយចូលរួមបញ្ញាក់ទទួលស្គាល់ពីក្រុមសាងសង ឬវិស្វករ។•	ផ្ដលពេលវេលា ជួសជុល កែលំអ និងតាមដាន ដល់ក្រុមសាងសង់ ឬវិស្វករយ៉ាងយូរ ១សប្ដាហ៏ត្រូវតែរួច ។•	ផ្ដល់ពណ៌មានជាក់ជាក់ លម្អិតជូនប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង ដើម្បីតាមដាន និងណែនាំលើកិច្ចការទាំងនោះបន្ថែម ។•	ត្រូវប្រាកដ និងធានាឲ្យបាន អគារ-ផ្ទះ គឺត្រូវបានត្រួតពិនិត្យច្បាស់លាស់ និងមិនមានចំនុចបញ្ហាបច្ចេលទេសផ្សេងៗ ពេលប្រគលជួនអតិថិជនជាដាច់ខាត ។•	សម្របសម្រួល ដោះស្រាយនូវការត្អូញត្អែលើចំណុចបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលស្ថិតក្រោមការធានានូវរវាងក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅកាន់អតិថិជន ។•	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៏ប្រគល់អគារ-ផ្ទះប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងសប្តាហ៏បញ្ជូនទៅប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ។•	អនុវត្តន៏ និងបំពេញភារៈកិច្ចដែលថ្នាក់លើបានណែនាំ និងកំណត់អោយ ។
Job Requirement: •	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្ររៀនវគ្គខ្លីកាន់តែប្រសើរ •	មានបទពិសោធន៏ យ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំ (រដ្ឋបាល ឬវិស្វករ -ល-) •	សកម្មនិងការងារស្មោះត្រង់ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ (គោរពពេលវេលា) •	បង្ហាញការងារផ្សេងទៀតដូចបានកំណត់ភារកិច្ច •	មានសុខភាពល្អ និងទទួលយកការណែនាំ ចាត់ចែងបន្ថែម

Job Description: Job DescriptionUnder the direct supervision of the Systems Support Supervisor, responsible for the support of all information system resources including but not limited to computers, networks, telephones, cell phones, and peripherals. As directed by the QA & System Support Supervisor, support the implementation of information systems and Core system technologies. Tasks include end user support, license tracking, documentation, Training material, Report produce for daily.Scope of Role- Application Support responsibilities, including:    - Provide fourth-level application support. - Application troubleshooting and resolution. - Vendor escalations (through ticketing process and follow-up)- Environment maintenance responsibilities, including: - Environment built-outs. - Training new environments synchronization. - Development and quality assurance (QA) environment maintenance- System administration responsibilities, including: - application installation/maintenance. - Application upgrade. - On-call responsibilities, including: - report any outages - Respond to any failed maintenance/ application notification. - Provide application management support for any weekend work - Analysing system architecture descriptions and translating into operational steps for deployment - Provide feedback to development team regarding required changes or improvement - Other duties may be assigned

Job Description:
1.	Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs.
2.	Plan, develop and organize the construction effort to formulate the most cost-effective plan to timely completion within budget and to implement the execution of that plan
3.	Coordinating and supervising construction workers, subcontractors and work activities
4.	Preparing the site with other construction professionals such as architects, engineers and surveyors before the construction work starts;
5.	Selecting tools and materials (Make a test of the tools before decided to buy it)
6.	Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
7.	Checking and preparing site reports 
8.	Assessing and minimizing risk
9.	Finding ways to prevent problems and to solve any that crop up
10.	Maintaining quality control procedures
11.	Keeping staff motivated and focused
12.	Another task assigns by project manager or project director.
Job Requirement:
1.	Bachelor Degree’s or Master Degree’s in Civil Engineering or other related fields
2.	At least 5 years’ experiences in related filed
3.	Exceptional ability to monitor construction project budgets and deadlines
4.	Advanced negotiation skills to procure cost-effective subcontractors and suppliers
5.	Experience in relaying detailed instructions to onsite construction teams
6.	Knowledgeable of construction safety regulations
7.	Good knowledge of building methods and regulations
8.	Decision-making ability and team motivation
9.	Good communication in English.

Job Description: •	Ensure SOP implementation in all departments and check the same during routine operational checks. •	Monitor the purchase request of each department.•	Randomly inspecting the stores (F & B / Kitchen) to check the stock in hand with the F & B Manager and Chef.•	Dealing with Suppliers and Vendors for quality products involving Purchase Manager and providing performance assessment of vendors every quarter to HO Purchase.•	Inspecting all departments for SOP implementation.•	Inspecting all department with their respective Manager's for cleanliness, ambience, service readiness, staff grooming & hospitality culture.•	Monitor the co-ordination between all departments for smooth and efficient operations.•	Assessing and reviewing customer satisfaction and service recovery process.•	Meet all dept. heads to review and train the staff to upkeep the human capital.•	Identifying staff learning needs and assisting with development•	Providing timely and constructive feedback to all direct reports as and when required either formally or informally.•	Conduct weekly and Daily meeting with marketing people for enquiry and follow up & conversion to grow up the business.•	Monitor and maintain operation & overhead cost in order to maintain maximum revenue to the organization.•	Responsible for the overall management of the operation of the hotel.•	Any other duties assigned.
Job Requirement: •	5-10 years’ experience in a similar role within the hospitality or resort industry.•	Previous leadership experience in operations.•	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Publisher, Outlook.•	Must possess excellent operations skills.•	Strong organizational and interpersonal communication skill.•	Self-organize, good teamwork and problem- solving skills.•	Must be able to work flexible hours including evenings, weekends and holidays.

Job Description:
1. Buying the product: Contraction Site
- To buy all the materials by follow purchasing plan and per assign from manager
- Make sure all purchasing plan are met the deadline 
- Prepare purchasing documents both hardcopy and softcopy plus invoices after buying the materials is must 

2. Petty Cash Controlling 
- To ensure that all purchasing material has been followed the budget
- Prepare monthly petty cash report and submit to manager per deadline (25th of the month)
- Other tasks assign by manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree of Administration or any relevant field 
• At least 1-year experiences from related field 
• Experience from Construct is plus 
• Good English in communication 
• Able to use Ms. Office word and excel
• Good knowledge in Construction material
• Good in negation skills 
• Good communication and follow up skills 
• Good communication 
• Good interpersonal skills

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY
1.	Conduct Workers and staff movement report at the site
-Daily update report for new joiner and resign of workers from the site.
-Daily update report employee resignation from the site.
-Daily update worker profiles.  

2.	Conduct Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily update workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily update employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3.	Administration coordination 
-Review employee request at the site include office stationary, purchase request, and uniforms. 
-Processing employee request at the site.
-Update office stationary, uniforms and working asset at the site.

4.	Implement Site Admin Policy &SOP
-Implement site admin working SOP.
-Updating policies to all employee at the site. 

5.	Conduct site inspection
-Regularly conduct site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Support management for investigation and reference check.
6.	Safety & Security Prevention
-Regularly conduct audit check on security.
-Conduct safety awareness practice. 
-Conduct hygiene auditing at the site.
7.	Working Accessories
-Update working office stationaries, uniform and purchase request. 
-Update stock in and out office stationary, uniform, and employee working accessories.
-Prepare employee work station.
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT

1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	University Degree

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	Over 1 years of work experience in Site Admin
•	Fluent in English Language
•	MS Office & Email
•	Experiencing working at construction company

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Strong skills MS. Office.
•	Strong skills in reporting
•	Strong skills in social communication tools
•	Strong skills in problem analyzing

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Excellence in communication and interpersonal skills
•	Effective team and relationship building
•	Strong knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
•	Good at strategic and critical thinking skills

Job Description:
	Develops and implements strategic marketing and sales plans and forecasts to achieve
	corporate objectives for products and services.
	Develops and manages sales/marketing operating budgets.
	Responsible for achieving aggressive monthly targets.
	Manages daily growth and development of assigned campaigns.
	Plans and oversees advertising and promotion activities.
	Formulate, organize and develop marketing activities by identifying the property trend and
new market opportunities.
	Update knowledge sales related legal documentation and property management
	Manage overall sales and marketing activities that include market research, sales
	presentations, analysis of sales and marketing trend, advertising and marketing promotional
events.
	Influences, communicates, motivates and inspires team members to achieve departmental
objectives.
	Control the monthly update of the marketing collators to ensue highest quality standards are
	met
	Monitors and follow-ups on specific tasks and project deliverables.
	Compiles, controls and monitors the budget in accordance with budget allocation/limits.
	Drafts, reviews and implements subject matter related policies, regulations, procedures and
systems of operations.
	Handle the relationship with clients and agents locally and globally.
	Participates in the recruitment process for the Sales & Marketing department, determining
staffing levels for the department.
	Provides recommendations on training and development, planning of subordinates.
	Analyses statistical information pertaining to staff attendance, overtime, leave and addresses
deviations or occurrences of abuse and/ or workplace conflict through the implementation of
corrective measures in accordance with Human Resources Policies and Procedures.
Job Requirement: 	Relevant Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing or Sales or Business Administration or similar.	At least 7 to 10 years of experience within Real Estate / Property Development industry, with atleast 5 years at managerial level.	Experience in strategy development within Marketing & Sales for Properties & Real Estate

- Managing parts of construction projects

- Team work and hard working
- Good in problem solving and leadership

Job Description:
1. To control material quantity is paralleled with purchase requisition (PR) & BoM
2. Prepare report on potential materials to ensure the actual requirement of material is prepared
3. Implement Warehouse Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) is efficiency
4. Monitor slow moving items are highly control efficiency
5. Adhere all materials are allocated based on items category and proper spaces
6. Prepare re-order level to fulfill the quantity of goods as required
7. Aware of non-usage items ensuring that those are used
8. Monitor or do spot check over physical material
9. Provide feedback and coaching purposes regarding operator error to warehouse team
10. Oversee all inventory transactions are performed and updated properly in the system
11. Control inventory report on time
Job Requirement:
1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	Bachelor’s/Associate degree

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	Over 2 years of work experience in Warehouse
•	2-3 years of work experience in management level
•	Good in English Language
•	MS Office & Email

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Good at FIFO and LIFO and FEFO methods
•	Good knowledge of 5s implementation strategy
•	Knowledge in project management, planning skills
•	Good knowledge of storage and organizing

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Good at communication and interpersonal skills
•	Leadership and management skills
•	Motivation/Problem solving skills

position: Accountant Executive (កំពត ត្រពាំងរពៅ)
Job Description: 1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting: Daily Finance Operation Supportingo Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and priceso Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant departmento Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etco To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accuratelyo Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & Po To be responsible for all inter-company accounts o Supporting document has been filling for audit purposeo To be responsible for all financial supporting Fixed Assetso Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly o Assets registration (Coding)o Manage Fixed Asset Movemento Handling Disposal Processo Prepare month-end journalo Conduct Physical Count2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRSo Assist for reconciled Financial Reportso Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: o Support for other management reports
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENTS

1) Bachelor’s Degree in Finance and Accounting or related field.
2) one-year experience in accounting role.
3) Knowledge of Cambodia tax and CIFRS for SME
4) Good English skills including writing, speaking, listening and reading.
5) Dynamic personality and strong creative outlook.
6) Be honest, flexible, hardworking, and willing to travel.

Job Description: • Report to Property Management Supervisor with the day to day operations and tenant relations through the coordination of tenant requests and administration of maintenance services. • Answer and route phone calls from tenants and vendors to the appropriate contact within Property Management and/or dispatch personnel based on immediate needs. • Provide tenants and vendors with assistance in all aspects of scheduling building maintenance, communicating building procedures and supplying general building information. • Provide high quality of customer service, update and maintain current daily and emergency tenant contact lists and tenant information manuals. • Process correspondence for tenants, contractors and other third parties for Property Management staff. • Handle miscellaneous assignments as requested by management • Assist property manager as needed on special projects • Assist with the coordination of house handover preparation ADMINISTRATION• Process the handover contract both soft and hard copy.GENERAL• Assist and administer handover agreements • Dispatch tenant work orders; Maintain tenant work order e-mail • Handle tenant, vendor and prospective tenant walk-ins • Assist with tenant and vendor related interface as needed • Assist Property Manager with tenant relations as required Relationships• Internal: Customer Service supervisor, property management supervisor• External: Contract office, Sale office, Construction office.
Job Requirement:
	Bachelor Degree in Architect or engineering,   
	At least 1 years experience in customer service (Handover is preferable)
	Positive attitude, Good Behavior and Critical thinking 
	English language proficiency
	Computer skills (MS, Office)
	Be honest, courtesy and highly responsible and initiative person
	Good communication skills and relationship skills.
	Good time management.
	Commitment to learn and expand responsibility to move up to next level.

Job Description:
-	Manage the entire effort for execution of work. The PM’s work includes the planning, coordinating, scheduling, tracking and cost control.
-	Ensure performed work according to budget plan
-	Ensure safety and technical meetings being conducted and issues raised being follow up
-	Spot check on site work.
-	Collate from staff and contribute local knowledge
-	Accurate project scheduling
-	On time project progress tracking
-	Accurate project cost tracking
-	Keep project hitting milestone on time
-	Problem-solving to bring project back on track if it is delayed.
Job Requirement:
-	At least five years experiences in Project Management and project bidding
-	Project scheduling, progress and cost tracking with Microsoft Project as a Minimum requirement, Proficient in Primavera P6 is Preferable, Able to utilize Tilos is an advantage
-	Bachelor degree of Civil Engineer or above
-	Good interpersonal and communication skills
-	Able to work independently and as part of team
-	Honest with high level of Integrity
-	Strong English skills both written and spoken
-	Able travel to province as needed

job title: ចុងភៅ (ម្ហូបខ្មែរ)
position: ចុងភៅ (ម្ហូបខ្មែរ)
Job Description: •	ធានាលើប្រតិបត្តិ្កការណ៍ និងគុណភាពផលិតផល ទាំងអស់ត្រូវបានរក្សា នៅក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌល្អបំផុត។•	ធានាថារាល់ការដាក់ឱ្យមានបុគ្គលិកតាមទីកន្លែង ត្រូវរៀបចំជាប្រចាំនិងទាន់ពេលវេលា(To do Mise En Place & Station)។•	ធានាថាលើគុណភាព រសជាតិ បរិមាណ ភណ្ឌភាព និងសេវ៉ាកម្មនៃមុខម្ហូបទាំងអស់ ត្រូវបានរៀបចំទៅតាមរូបមន្តត្រឹមត្រូវ។•	ធានាថាបរិវេណផ្ទះបាយរបស់អ្នកត្រូវបានរក្សាភាពស្អាត អនាម័យ និងមានសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់គ្រប់ពេលវេលា។•	ធានាថាបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកចុងភៅនិងសិក្ខាកាមទាំងទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ទាំងចំណេះ ចំនាញត្រឹមត្រូវនិងការណែនាំដ៏ល្អបំផុត។•	រាយការណ៍អំពីភាពមិនប្រក្រតីណាមួយជូនដល់ប្រធានផ្នែក ដូចជាគ្រឿងបរិក្ខារមិនប្រក្រតី	•	ធានាបំពេញតួនាទីក្នុងការអវត្តមានរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកនិងទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះផ្ទះបាយនៅពេលដែលត្រូវដឹកនាំ។•	ធានារាល់ការ បញ្ជារទិញគ្រប់មុខទំនិញឬផលិតផល ត្រូវធានានូវគុណភាព សុវត្តិភាព ការផ្កត់ផ្កង់ ឲ្យសមស្របតាមបរិមាណនៃការលក់ ឬការប្រើប្រាស់។
Job Requirement: •	ធ្វើឱ្យទាន់សម័យជានិច្ចនូវចំនេះដឹងនិងជំនាញរបស់ខ្លួនសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ក្នុងក្រុមការងារ និងក្រុមហ៊ុន។•       មានជំនាញទៅលើម្ហូបខ្មែរ និង​អ៊ឺរ៉ុបខ្លះៗ។•	ជួយជាទៀងទាត់នៅពេលចាំបាច់។•	គោរពនូវច្បាប់វិន័យ និងពេលវេលា។•	មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការសរសេររបាយការណ៍ការ ណែនាំស្តីពីការអនុវត្ត។ មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបង្ហាញព័ត៌មានប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពនិងឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងសំណួរពីក្រុមអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង សមាជិក និងបុគ្គលិក។

Job Description:
1. To control material quantity is paralleled with purchase requisition (PR) & BoM
2. Prepare report on potential materials to ensure the actual requirement of material is prepared
3. Implement Warehouse Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) is efficiency
4. Monitor slow moving items are highly control efficiency
5. Adhere all materials are allocated based on items category and proper spaces
6. Prepare re-order level to fulfill the quantity of goods as required
7. Aware of non-usage items ensuring that those are used
8. Monitor or do spot check over physical material
9. Provide feedback and coaching purposes regarding operator error to warehouse team
10. Oversee all inventory transactions are performed and updated properly in the system
11. Control inventory report on time
Job Requirement:
1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	Bachelor’s/Associate degree

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	Over 2 years of work experience in Warehouse
•	2-3 years of work experience in management level
•	Good in English Language
•	MS Office & Email

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Good at FIFO and LIFO and FEFO methods
•	Good knowledge of 5s implementation strategy
•	Knowledge in project management, planning skills
•	Good knowledge of storage and organizing

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Good at communication and interpersonal skills
•	Leadership and management skills
•	Motivation/Problem solving skills

Job Description:
Job Descriptions 

Create and develop multimedia (audio/video) content for customer stories, internal company announcement videos, external promotional social videos, product marketing videos, and others.
•	Proposed Script, storyboard, budget, allocate resources, and deadlines arrangement.
•	Work independently, as well as part of a team, to establish video production as per requirement from management.
•	Collaborate closely with internal team for talent shooting 
•	Video Promotion shoots, editing, animating, select and reserve shoot locations
•	Develop production schedules and editing timeline
•	Technical support on animation, graphic and bumper to post in every social channel.
•	Control advertising in order to post monthly. 
•	Reserve and rent equipment as per assigned tasks.
•	Record and edit video and sound projects, including selecting program format for final output, capturing/importing media, organizing raw media, editing footage and sound files, creating and inserting static and motion graphics, titling, adding music/voice-over to support digital part to promote sale.
•	Manage video library.
•	Control shooting material and stock.
•	Supporting related department as per assigned from management.
Job Requirement:
Requirement

•	Bachelor degree in production shooting and video editing or related flied.
•	At least 3 years’ experience in real estate industry. 
•	Knowledge of TVC or video producing. 
•	Knowledge of technical lighting set up and lighting capacity.
•	Knowledge of sound and effect for Video and TVC.
•	Good communication to manage shooting team.
•	Well understanding of technical material for shooting equipment.

Job Description: Job Descriptions • Supporting the marketing team with any Graphic Design requirements• Designing all the company’s graphics including all sales and marketing materials such as catalogues, online banners and branded materials• Cooperates with marketing team and operations regarding all designing materials• Assist in taking photo and video at construction sites and prepare comprehensive layout of design.• Assist in organizing media for company event• Research and present new ideas of design and video to team member• Perform other duties as assigned by Head of Sale & Marketing

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
1.   ការងារប្រតិបត្តិប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
1.1  ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង(ល្បាយបេតុង ឬស្លាំ) នៅការដ្ឋាន និង ការថែទាំម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត។
1.2  ពិនិត្យការចាក់ដុំតេស្ត​ (Mold Test Concrete) ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.3  ពិនិត្យការធ្វើស្លាំរបស់ក្រុមការងារ នៅការដ្ឋានត្រឹមត្រូវ តាមបច្ចេកទេស។
1.4  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ការថែទាំដុំតេស្ត និងការសង្កត់បានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.5  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ទៅលើវត្ថុធាតុដើមអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។  

2.   ការកត់ត្រា ការរៀបចំ និងការធ្វើរបាយការណ៏   
2.1  តាមដាននិងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្លាំ នៅតាមការដ្ឋានអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងជាប្រចាំ
2.2  រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា

3.   ការងារផ្សេងៗ
3.1  ផ្តល់ដំណឹងរាល់បញ្ហាកើតមាន មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័ និងក្នុងGroup ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងដំណោះស្រាយ។
3.2  មានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយ បញ្ហានានាបានលឿន និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។
3.3  រាយការណ៍មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័បន្ទាន់ករណីមិនអាចដោះស្រាយបាន។
Job Requirement:
- បានបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកវិស្វកម្មសំណង់ ឫជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត និង ការថែទាំបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន
- មានភាពបត់បែននិងធ្វើការនៅខេត្តបាន

Job Description:
Job Descriptions 

-	Propose and assist in setting up the organization’s pay structure and benefits offerings
-	Determine competitive wage rates and develop or modify compensation plans
-	Evaluate employee benefits policies to assess whether they are current, competitive, and company future plan
-	Prepares payroll calculation & payroll record
-	Keep all payroll dimensions such employee info, pay change, cost & employment status movement and other payroll transaction change on tracks 
-	Follow the section KPI to ensure full document and data support before payroll payout
-	Performs others tasks as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
Requirement

-	Master/Bachelor degree in Management or other related field
-	At least 2 years working experiences related payroll
-	Strong, effective and transparent delivery of communication with different stakeholders in the organization, senior management, mid managers or employees
-	Willing to continue building skills through training opportunities 
-	Good communication and interpersonal skills
-	Experience with employee satisfaction surveys

Job Description:
1. Desirable to pass some ACCA exams. (Especially F7), Tax Agent license
2. Experience studying at an accounting school (especially CamEd)
3. Experience working at an accounting firm
(* It is unlikely from experience to hire an assistant manager based on work experience only at a business company)
Job Requirement:
1. English skill (Business level)
2. Age: 28-35
3. Accounting/taxation advice and education for subordinate and involvement in in-house education planning
4. Have working experiences in accounting firm;
5. Review of accounting bookkeeping work
6. Review of Monthly Tax and Annual tax return
7. Support Tax Audit case to Tax Manager
8. Implementation of accounting review service (including advisory to clients)
9. Good at interpersonal and communication skills;
10. Contact with related Ministries and any agencies
11. Other consulting services (establishment services, etc.)

Job Description: • Review purchase requisitions and ensure accurate upload of all assets in the fixed asset register.• Coordinate all fixed asset purchases with the various departments and collate updates on new additions on a monthly basis.• Ensure all new assets are properly labelled and set up in the fixed asset register and individual asset account.• Periodically reconcile and coordinate physical stock taking of fixed assets to ensure proper location and existence of all fixed assets• Ensure accurate entries for all fixed assets acquisition, disposal/movements and depreciation.• Prepare monthly report of asset stock in/out• Other tasks are assigned by superior.

Job Description:
1.	Coordinating between all sites of the company for quality control
2.	Review the process of construction at the site periodically & profess changes to adhere to quality norms
3.	Perform daily inspection and required test of construction materials to achieve the quality of construction required in the drawings and specifications
4.	Monitoring and checking for all quality related procedures and activities at site to follow method statement and inspection
5.	Review quality of all materials at site and ensure compliance to all project specifications and quality and collaborate with department for all material procurement and maintain quality of materials
6.	Other task assign by team leader.

-	Graduated Bachelor Degree of Civil Engineer 
-	Experience 1 year up
-	Honestly 
-	Hard Working
-	Hight Responsibility 
-	Can work under pressure
-	Can use computer skill : Auto CAD, Microsoft Officer

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY
1.	Be responsible for answering all incoming calls, resident questions and handling daily mail, Phone Call, Telegram etc, 
2.	Greet prospects and residents when they come into Borey and Condominium , Work with the property management team on incoming applications for prospective residents
3.	Preparing operating reports Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met Ensuring the efficiency of all building systems
4.	Prepare reports for facility owners and attend regular meetings where the upkeep of the building is on the agenda
5.	Managing facilities planning and space allocation Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met
6.	Interact with residents, respond to inquiries with high degree of tact and professionalism
7.	Handle certain administrative tasks, Request, Stock Controlling
8.	Work with the property management team and Project team , relevant team on incoming applications for prospective residents
9.	Other Tasks assigned by link management
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT

1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	Bachelor Degree of Administration, Hotel, Accounting    

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	Experience in hospitality above 1 year 
•	English, Chinese (Option)
•	Understand customer service and analysis customer issue  
•	Administration Skill 
•	MS Office & Email, telegram….. 

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Front desk Service 
•	House Keeping
•	Accounting 

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Excellence in communication and interpersonal skills
•	Effective team and relationship building
•	Strong knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory

Job Description: Scope of RoleA Help desk officer provides technical support and assistance, whether on the phone, in person, or remotely, related to computer systems, network, hardware, and software. A Help desk officer. Job Description•	Provide level 1 technical support across the company and handled projects•	Responding to queries on ITSM system, via email, in person, social media or through remote access.•	Monitoring and Responding in a timely manner base on SLA to service issues and requests on ITSM system•	Offering technical assistance on the delivery, configuration, set up, maintenance, and troubleshooting of computer systems, hardware, and software Telephone system, finger print and CCTV system and network.•	Determine the best solution based on the issue and details provided by customers, repairing and replacing equipment if necessary.•	Ensure security and privacy of networks and computer systems.•	Walk the customer through the problem-solving process •	Escalade the unhandled issues to the next level of support•	Follow-up and update customer status and information •	Pass on any feedback or suggestions by customers to the appropriate channel•	Identify and suggest possible improvements on procedures. •	Other tasks assigned by Supervisor/Manager.•	Documented events and problems and their resolution in logs •	Monthly report to supervisor
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field.•	1+ years working as a help desk support or relevant field.•	Knowledge of computer hardware systems, networking system, Telephone system, finger print and CCTV system.•	Knowledge of computer software systems, office applications, and operating systems.•	Knowledge of help desk software and remote-access systems.•	Ability to troubleshoot complex hardware and software issues.•	Ability to learn new technologies quickly and willing to learn.•	Ability to work under pressure in autonomy and flexibility.•	Good inter-personal skills, confident and motivated person.•	Patience and understanding.

Job Description: o Punctuality at workplace and arrival on time always.o Start working on customer vehicles without delay.o Reduce Idle Time and always maintain productivity.o Clocking in and clocking out Autoline Clocking System.o Clocking on and off each job when completed.o Completes work WRITE UP including details of customer concerns and parts required.o Analyses CUSTOMER PRIME ITEM and assesses the accuracy of the repair.o Interpret worksheets, estimates and itemised job cards/service orders.o Ensures vehicles are protected and kept clean during service and repairo Ensures vehicle safety standards have been complied with when returned to customers o Carries out vehicle health checks and identifies areas of concerno Carries out preparations for new vehicleso Interpret and implement technical data and instructionso Conducts routine service work on vehicles brought into the workshop.o Maintains tools and equipment and checks the calibration and general condition of workshop equipment in line with company policy.o Suggests and implements changes to improve workshop processes and customer service o Assist the Team Leader in daily work activities.o Not to throw away any old parts unless given permission to do so. o Maintaining a clean work bay before going home every night.o Ensure all warranty jobs have their old parts returned to the parts dept.o No customer communication at all times, do not take any gifts from customers.o No jobs to be done without a job card at all times.
Job Requirement: •	A minimum of 3 years of working experience as a Technician (or including apprenticeship)•	Be able to understand the repair manual or technical tip in English•	Ability to write a story clearly and concisely•	Ability to meet tight deadlines with attention to detail•	Highly self-motivated, committed team player with the desire to learn•	Maintains a professional appearance and a neat work area. •	Willing to learn as a part of further personal development.

Job Description:
1.	Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs.
2.	Plan, develop and organize the construction effort to formulate the most cost-effective plan to timely completion within budget and to implement the execution of that plan
3.	Coordinating and supervising construction workers, subcontractors and work activities
4.	Preparing the site with other construction professionals such as architects, engineers and surveyors before the construction work starts;
5.	Selecting tools and materials (Make a test of the tools before decided to buy it)
6.	Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
7.	Checking and preparing site reports 
8.	Assessing and minimizing risk
9.	Finding ways to prevent problems and to solve any that crop up
10.	Maintaining quality control procedures
11.	Keeping staff motivated and focused
12.	Another task assigns by project manager or project director.
Job Requirement:
1.	Bachelor Degree’s or Master Degree’s in Civil Engineering or other related fields
2.	At least 5 years’ experiences in related filed
3.	Exceptional ability to monitor construction project budgets and deadlines
4.	Advanced negotiation skills to procure cost-effective subcontractors and suppliers
5.	Experience in relaying detailed instructions to onsite construction teams
6.	Knowledgeable of construction safety regulations
7.	Good knowledge of building methods and regulations
8.	Decision-making ability and team motivation
9.	Good communication in English.

Job Description:
** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យតម្លៃប្រេងសាំងលក់ចេញ-ទិញចូល វិក្កយបត្រចំណូល និងចំណាយ
- ប្រកាសពន្ធគ្រប់ប្រភេទដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងអាជីវកម្មក្រុមហ៊ុន (ពន្ធកាត់ទុកទូទៅ ពន្ធបៀវត្សរ អាករលើតម្លៃបន្ថែម អាករបន្ទុករដ្ឋ ពន្ធរំដោះលើប្រាក់ចំណូល ពន្ធលើប្រាក់ចំណូល ពន្ធប្រថាប់ត្រា ពន្ធតែមប្រិ៍ ពន្ធប៉ាតង់ ពន្ធមធ្យោបាយលើការដឹកជញ្ជូន ពន្ធលើប្រាក់ចំណេញមូលធន ការធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព...)
- បិទបញ្ជីប្រចាំខែតាមស្ថានីយប្រេង និងចុះពិនិត្យការងារតាមបណ្តាខេត្ត
- រៀបចំ និងបូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានតាមពេលកំណត់ ដោះស្រាយ
- ការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និងថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគណនេយ្យ
- បទពិសោធន៍ការងារគណនេយ្យ និងការប្រកាសពន្ធយ៉ាងតិច ៣ឆ្នាំ
- ចេះជំនាញ Advance Excel, Word, Power Point 
- ចំណេះជំនាញក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ និងកត់ត្រាប្រព័ន្ធគណនេយ្យ QuickBooks
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស សម្រាប់ទំនាក់ទំនង
- ចំណេះជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងទូទៅ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
