Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced, talented leader to join EFG as a Head of Brand for new upcoming brand

The Head of Brand has a primary responsibility of leading operations and will oversee all aspects of marketing, sales, and training to achieve our sales target. They will manage the Brand’s P&L and day-to-day operations. He/she is expected to provide continuous coaching of direct reports to serve the customer as their top priority. This role will be expected to devise, develop, and implement marketing programs and initiatives designed to ensure the economic, strategic, and operational growth of the Brand.

This is a hand-on role where he/she must spend majority of his or her time at the store and be able to work cross departmental. This role will also work closely with our Franchisor in the development of the Brand and will be involved in the planning of a potential regional expansion.

This person must possess strong organizational skills, outstanding communication skills, sound judgment and decision-making skills, a passion for innovation, and embrace can-do attitude and spirit.

1. Operation management

-Develop annual budget and business strategy, and annual operating plan and resources planning and allocations.

-Manage business reporting and fulfil all requirements on marketing/ sales/ inventory through sales trends

-Manage and ensure execution of store operating standards in accordance with franchiser guideline and EFG’s business goals that optimize returns on assets and increases sales and improves profits.

-Ensure strong execution in stores to deliver against strategic and financial objectives.

-Lead and train store team in operational standards, marketing execution and customer store team.

-Accountable for budget and P&L of the Brand.

-Analyzing market trends and preparing forecasts. Setting SOPs and KPIs according to best industry practice and needs of Brand.

-Ensure crisis management system is followed as required to maintain efficient operations.

2. Sales & Marketing

-Day-to-day management of the Brand (Forecasting, sales target, meeting sales gaps, store & inventory management)

-Translate brand elements into plans and go-to-market strategies.

-Define and manage the brand communication strategy using a variety of media

-Own the development and messaging of the brand narrative, strengthen, and grow the -Brand awareness working in close partnership with the Australia franchisor.

-Create, execute, and manage omni-channel marketing programs and campaigns in linkage to sales target.

-Evaluate sales trends and take appropriate action plans. Analyze product launches and -----lead improvements on product offerings. Conduct periodic review of menu, inventory and propose appropriate adjustments.

3. People

-Conduct appropriate resource planning for the Brand. Including recruitment, hiring, promoting, and retaining talents

-Provide leadership and direction to all stores to drive KPIs maximizing Brand’s performance

-Coach, counsel and develop Operations team in the achievement of company standards and their personal development plans.

-Identify and manage learning, training, and development opportunities to address progression needs and improve employee skill set levels to support career growth.

-Work in close partnership with internal and external stakeholders.
Job Requirement:
-At least 5-year experience in management position of F&B or hospitality operations.

-At least 5-year experience in management position of F&B or hospitality operations.

-Experience with budgets, P&L statements, capital expenditures and planning and forecasting.
Knowledge of standards or food safety and sanitation audits.

-Strong skill in driving for results.

-Strong in people management and development. Experienced in leading teams

Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #320, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Tek Laak 1, Khan Toul Kok 017 888 349

job title: QC and Inventory Controller អ្នកពិនិត្យគុណភាព & គ្រប់គ្រងទំនិញ
company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
position: QC and Inventory Controller អ្នកពិនិត្យគុណភាព & គ្រប់គ្រងទំនិញ
Job Description:
	Quality Control’s Responsibilities
o	Inspect quality of goods receiving inbound from oversea
o	Be sure all goods are in good package condition before assigning location
o	Make clear check information of goods receiving match with packing list
o	Record good and damage item into quality control document list
o	Inspect outbound delivery to customer be sure good condition of item before loading to the trucks
o	Can analyze root cause of damage Item from receiving and return into warehouse
o	Analyze and monitor on product storage and packaged to determine if risks will be happen   
o	Work toward team and individual KPIs
o	Other tasks as assigned by Management
	Inventory Controller Responsibilities
o	Achieve efficient layout of the warehouse to optimize picking efficiency
o	Maintain locations and pick faces
o	Manage cycle counting and stock take
o	Promptly address any issues with locations, receiving, put away, picking, and dispatching
o	Work closely with warehouse staff and inventory control team members to ensure accuracy of inventory count and locations
o	Action all stock/picking discrepancies
o	Manage clearance process and scheduling of inwards containers
o	Support the receiving function and paperwork
o	Manage the processing of all returned goods, including identification of saleable returned stock and returned stock to be scrapped
o	Regular reporting of inventory accuracy and other KPI’s, as required by management.
o	Monitor stock accuracy and organize replenishment if needed
o	Responsible for the purchasing and inventory levels and management of all regular stock lines
o	Other tasks as assigned by Management

HOW YOU CAN SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE
Within Sinh Hak Hout, the top-performing people who do this job always demonstrate the following attitude: 
•	Working with Others:
o	A genuine interest in the welfare of all company team member is the first and most critical requirement for this role.
o	They maintain the trust of the team member, and are regarded as fair, reasonable, approachable, and honest.  
o	They are passionate about improving staff welfare and guest satisfaction.  They are focused on achieving results and continual improvement.
o	They always try to anticipate and exceed the needs of customers and team member.
o	They use their own initiative and good judgement to solve problems in a calm and efficient way

o	They enjoy working with others to achieve common goals.  They volunteer as required to ensure the success of the team.
o	They act with personal professionalism and integrity at all times
•	Taking Responsibility:
o	They always conduct business honestly and fairly.  They keep sensitive information confidential.
o	They can prioritise their workload effectively and be organised and structured at work
o	They manage their time and pay attention to detail.  They know their jobs, and are able to work without close supervision.
o	They display a positive attitude, even under pressure.  They personally check their work to ensure its accuracy.
•	Delivering Results:
o	They are committed to meeting and exceeding all performance standards.
o	They constantly look to develop their own professional skills and abilities.
o	They perform job tasks in line with established policies and procedures.
o	They always try to provide a top-quality experience to all our team members and guests.
Job Requirement:
o	Bachelor degree Business Administration or Other relevant fields is advantage
o	3-year experience as warehouse inventory controller and Quality Controller
o	Experience in leading and motivating a small team.
o	Be able to operate a forklift
o	Fully understand warehouse operational systems and processes
o	Knowledge of inventory and supply chain management 
o	Be able to analyze problems and offer solutions
o	Ability to input, retrieve and analyze data
o	   Good time management and planning, Organizing and analytical skills. 
o	   Be able to work independently and perform tasks with limited supervision.
o	   Highly effective, dynamic, and result-oriented with strong sense of responsibility
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training

- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Job Description:
•	Works with Users, Business Project Managers, IT Support Team, IT PMO, Finance, Commercial and other stakeholders to understand their needs and requirements and tailor appropriate solutions.

•	Work with Business Owners/Data Analyst to develop key business questions and to build datasets that answer those questions.
•	Help to implement new data management projects and re-structure of the current data architecture.
•	Assist team in data management projects when needed.
•	Process and load third party data sources.
•	Work with Business Customers in understanding the business requirements and implementing solutions.
•	Identify and solve issues concerning data management to improve data quality.
•	Develop best practices for data management, maintenance, reporting and security.
•	Improve data foundational procedures, guidelines and standards.
•	Review dataset implementations performed by other data engineers.
•	Perform additional data and database related tasks.
•	Learn new technology if require
•	Resolve tickets on Web Helpdesk
Job Requirement:
•	(The minimum education, experience, knowledge, skills & attitude required to perform the position)
•	Education: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology
•	Experience: at least 2 year experiences in Data warehouse, ETL tools, Data processing, Hive, Spark, Kafka, …. 
•	Skills: Data structure, coding, Machine learning, Data warehouse, ETL, Data integration
•	Knowledge: data structure, programming, big data, database (Oracle, Postgres), business concept
•	Attitude: active, hard-working, honest, responsibility, friendly

Job Description: * Strategy and Planning- Initiate, define, plan, communicate and follow up company's   business strategy regarding Private Banking business in order   to ensure company’s long-term viability and market share.- Develop an appropriate marketing plan with marketing team to   efficiently and effectively achieve goals and objectives   through design and implement workable and innovative   solutions for client’s needs.- Keep abreast of latest market trend, analyze customers'   behavior, key financial drivers and competitors'' strategy to   sustain a continuous service growth.* Customer Acquisition & Revenue Target- Present and provide highly professional consultations to   target corporate clients and HNWI to address their demands   and match with the Bank’s products and services.- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide   sound financial advice and tailored solutions for the clients   as well as to take the opportunity to cross-sell other   banking products.- Prepare and execute loan contracts and arrange loan   disbursement timely and accurately to fulfill clients’ needs   and satisfactions.- Closely monitor on recommended/processed loan for timely   repayment and to ensure Portfolio at Risk remains within   acceptable level.- Solicit, build and maintain new and existing local   corporate/HNW individual clients in accordance with the   guidelines stated in the Commercial Banking policies and   procedures to ensure sustainable and secure deposit and loan   portfolios and expending scope to investment and other   products/services as cross-selling.* Customer Relationship Management- Make regular site visits to existing clients to determine the   actual conditions of the business and loan collateral whether   it should remain the same or be downgraded as well as to   develop relationship with clients as part of retention   strategies.- Act as liaison between clients and internal operations team   to timely and effectively understand and provide all types of   banking products including but not limited to deposits,   loans, trade finances and remittance for the clients.- Handle complex clients’ issues or complaints to find an   amicable solution for all and process to higher authority if   needed.* Project Management & Process Improvement- Lead projects on developing and launching new   initiatives/services and creating new service features and   process regarding Private Banking as needed to improve/gain   market penetration/share- Coordinate with different departments, including Operations,   Finance & IT in streamlining processes, Marketing to drive   business growth and Risk and Compliance in ensuring adherence   of relevant policies and guidelines.* Staff Management- Supervise staff in daily tasks, operations and quality   control.- Coordinate available resources for maximum outcomes.- Act as a role model within the team to question, listen and   give actionable feedback carefully in order to create a   productive work atmosphere towards “speak up culture”.- Oversee Deposit Initiatives such as new product development,   feature enhancements, client experience improvement, pricing   management, campaign/promotion to support deposit raising   etc. in their entire lifecycle from client value proposition   conception, tech budgetary negotiation & planning, product   approval/approval, project management and risk/control   governance etc- Oversee day-to-day deposits product management across all   markets including review/approval of deposit campaigns   (tactical, bundles, solus, thematic, digital focused, etc.),   monthly deposit reviews with markets, weekly deposit balance   monitoring and flash process, month-end revenue analysis, and   annual Plan and mid-year forecast exercise.
Job Requirement: - BA in Business, Economics, Accounting, Banking or Finance- Minimum 3 years' experience in Sales & Customers or Partners   Relationship Management / Business Analysis / Project   Management / Transformation / Digital , preferably gained in   Banking or Financial Services industry or consultancy and in   particular in Corporate, Retail Banking, Banking and Cash   Management, Lending / Investment is a plus- Good in spoken / written English and in another foreign   language is a plus- Strong customer/partner relationship, customer services and   deal/project structuring/implementation- Good analytical, communication and interpersonal skills- Having high level of confidentiality, integrity and business   ethic

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description: - Receiving payment from subordinate.- Manage expense and prepare payment to supplier.- Check daily transaction from the bank.- Check transaction for OTA, or Agents and issue invoice as needed.- Run Billing.- Record transactions into accounting system.- Controlling fix assents.- Manage vendor and supplier to ensure cost expense is qualify and met.- Check and verifies stock in system.- Prepare bank and sale report every day.- Prepare, check, and count petty cash report.- Verified expense with all operation units. - Monthly tax document preparation. - Administration and document in and out withing department and cross department. - Other tasks as assigned by line manager.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Company Profile:
Established in 1977, Pantos Logistics has grown steadily to become the No. 1 logistics business in Korea. Pantos now is under  LG Group , and we offers services related to export/import, air/ocean/railroad/overland transportation, customs clearance, warehousing, the handling of logistics consultation to customers.
We have made concerted efforts to expand the global logistics operation network, establishing more than 180 overseas networks in 40 countries, including the America, Europe, the CIS countries, Asia, and the Middle East. We plan to increase their number to over 200 overseas networks by 2020.

Job Description:

Company Profile:
About Us

Grant Thornton Cambodia is an independent member within Grant Thornton International and a wholly foreign-owned company. Grant Thornton’s presence in Cambodia first started in 2004. A reorganisation in 2011 incorporated the expertise of Grant Thornton Malaysia to expand the service lines to meet the increasing demand for quality audit and advisory services of local business and international investors in Cambodia. 

Grant Thornton has offices in more than 140 counties and  56,000 staff.

To support our continued growth, we are looking for a high calibre talented professional to manage a Client portfolio and oversee the provision of high quality audit, accounting and tax compliance services.

As a member firm of one of the largest Professional services firms in the world, Grant Thornton Cambodia continuously requires high caliber talented personnel to join our growing team.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   023 966 520 hr.recruitment@kh.gt.com 20th Floor Canadia Tower | 315 Preah Ang Duong Street corner Monivong Blvd | Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh | Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia 023 966 520

Job Description:
• Performs audit work in Client’s office for audit areas assigned to him/her; follows audit techniques suggested by assistant managers/senior associate and considers work paper documentation required by assistant managers/senior associate in documenting the audit work done.
• Reports to assistant managers/senior associate any audit/accounting issues noted for a Client and discusses/proposes alternative solutions to the issue noted.
• Ensures that all overtime work is pre-approved by assistant managers/senior associate by completing an overtime form sheet
• Resolves all review notes of audit partner/manager/assistant manager/senior associate
• Documents all audit procedures performed before signing off on the audit programme
• Ensures that the audit work is completed with the quality consistent with GT standards within time budget prepared by supervisor/senior
• Provides miscellaneous assistance to higher-level personnel in the preparation of Proposals or in various other projects
• Provides explanations and on-the-job training to assistants with less experience
• Performs clerical duties related to Engagements such as requisitioning supplies needed by Engagement team for fieldwork and organizing paper work files prior to review by higher-level personnel or before filing
• Conducts himself/herself professionally and liaises with Client’s middle management for smooth flow of audit work
• Maintains a good working relationship with the Client
Job Requirement:
1. Education: University degree preferably in Auditing/ Accounting or business related fields
2. Special license/certificate: Either holds a current and valid ACCA/CPA's certificate, or be working toward obtaining the certificates by taking and passing the applicable state ACCA/CPA exams
3. Minimum 1 year of recent external audit service, and dealing in team work
4. Good working knowledge of Word, Excel and PowerPoint and Internet searching skill
5. Good command of English

Job Description: - Launch Onion Mobility in multiple new markets and set them up for scale.- Build and lead a world-class Expansion team: Recruit, motivate and develop the talent we need to accomplish all of the below. Set the team up for success with the right direction, resources, and skill-set in order to achieve aligned business goals. Develop a regular cadence of review to build accountability and accelerate progress.- Write and own the Expansion playbook: Comprehensively understand the past, present, and desired future of the business. Define our Expansion roadmap as guidance to how we operate; effective in the short-term and scalable over the long term.- Cross-functional thought leadership: Collaborate closely with the other leaders to meet objectives around product experience, growth, and scalability.- Define GTM strategy: Research and develop a deep understanding of potential markets, including addressable size, readiness and competitiveness landscape.- Manage operations: Drive day-to-day execution to successfully launch and grow in new markets. This involves being hands-on setting up the stations, developing operational processes. and defining after-service services.- Business alignment: Independently articulate and champion the state of play of the markets we expand into. Define market-level OKRs and seek support and alignment from leadership and operational teams.- Cross-functional coordination: Coordinate across Operations, Product, Finance, Sales and Marketing among various other teams to scope, define, prioritize, and roll out playbooks for every phase of a market’s growth- Flawless execution towards market growth: Responsible for growth targets aligned with HQ. Intrinsically understand the growth and cost drivers and execute against them. Be the local pacemaker and maintain a regular cadence of reporting. Make impact-driven decisions to optimize towards growth targets and operational efficiency- Inspire with the Homage mission: Represent the brand and mission of Homage internally with local team members, and externally with PR and events- Hiring of city leadership: Assess the maturity of markets and drive recruitment of city leadership at the right stage of time.
Job Requirement: - Minimum of 5+ years of relevant work experience in strategy, operations and/or growth with 3+ years of managerial experience- Proven track record of making an impact in a rapidly growing global organization- Entrepreneurial: Proven ability to build from scratch including hiring and team building. Ability and desire to operate resourcefully, independently, and with urgency.- Impact-driven and persistent: Motivated by moving the needle meaningfully, especially during times when it requires persistence and courage.- Analytical: Ability to closely examine and identify relevant information, and earn the respect of both leaders and operational teams by translating insights into clear, sizable operational plans.- Operational excellence: You have a keen eye for detail and an exceptionally high bar for accuracy and quality. Similarly, you hold your team to that level of standards.- Strong opinions, loosely held: Ability to articulate POV with clarity, humility, and a willingness to question one’s own assumptions/desire to constantly improve.- People leadership, with an eye for talent: Ability to assess and develop the talent we require to be successful. You lead with influence and build strong, productive relationships with various working styles and characteristics.- Business acumen: You deeply understand business fundamentals, potential growth, and cost drivers, and can translate complex information into actionable operational plans in the context of driving business performance.- Integrity and trustworthiness- Excellent written and verbal skills in English and Khmer- A passion for changing the country- Experience and understanding of the auto or tech industry is a plus
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

Company Profile:
Pernod Ricard is the second-largest premium wines & spirits group, operating in over 86 affiliates and producing the widest international product portfolio in the industry with top brands such Absolut Vodka, Martell Cognac, Mumm Champagne, The Glenlivet, and Chivas Regal whisky among others. Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. imports and distributes products from the Group portfolio into the Cambodian market.
 
BACKGROUND
Pernod Ricard SA was created in 1975 through the link-up of the two largest French anise-based spirits companies: Pernod, which was founded in 1805, and Ricard, founded by Paul Ricard in 1932. Strategic M&A over the past three decades have vaulted Pernod Ricard into one of the top-tier international Wines & Spirits organizations in the world. In July 2017, Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

Marketing Officer oversees the company’s marketing campaigns both internally and externally and plays a key part in communicating the organizations marketing message by working with other related department in promoting brand awareness.

2. Duties & responsibilities:

- Creating marketing campaigns and working with corporate partners
(TVs, Radios, Social Event Organizers) to maximize brand awareness.
- Preparing, planning and managing the distribution of the publication materials
(Leaflets, Calendars, Banners, .Etc.).
- Preparing and managing Advertising Schedule for advertising agency.
(Magazines, newspapers, billboards, Digital billboards, .etc.)
- Creating and developing new advertising concepts and drafting art work to deliver marketing massage to the target customers.
- Managing online marketing campaign and response to enquiries on Social Network Site. (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Etc.)
- Do the marketing budget planning and manage advertising tax payment.
- Updating and evaluating the effectiveness of all marketing activity.
- Preparing research and survey to develop and implement new marketing projects and promotions.
- Supporting other tasks as directed by the marketing Manager/Director.
Job Requirement:
3.Qualification & requirement:
- A bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration or a similar skill.
- At least 2 or more years of work experience of marketing with Media / private company.
- Have knowledge of a marketing techniques and concepts
- Have experience working with media and advertising agency
- Be an excellent communicator, negotiator and think creatively
- Have design skills and Analytic program such as SPSS, MarketSight, DataCracker, .Etcs.
- Work well in a team and be well presented with a professional manner
- High ability to communicate in English and others language is an advantage.
- Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility.
- Applicants submitted with Study Records/Transcripts are highly prioritized.

4. Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Saturday: 08:30 am to 12:00 am & 01:00 pm to 05:50 pm
- Lunch time : 12:00 pm to 01:00 pm

6. Relationship:
- Marketing Officer Work under supervise & report directly to Marketing Director.

7. Salary and Benefit:
- Salary (Negotiation)
- Lunch
- Uniform

Job Description:
* MISSION
Passerelles numériques Cambodia (PNC) is looking for an External Relations Officer for its External Relations Department. 

S/he will be responsible for company visit management, internship and job placement for students, partnership development, and working on other tasks written down in the section of duties and responsibilities below.


Objectives for external relations 
Increase the partnership opportunity of PN Cambodia with local companies/NGOs in terms of skills sharing, recruitment and sponsorship with the support of External Relations team

*. DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES

- Under the supervision of the External Relation (ER) Manager, the Junior External Relations Officer will work in the team to:

*	Partnership Building :

-	Creation, maintenance and expansion of a sustainable relationship with companies, institutions, and organizations through face-to-face meetings, participating in external events, organizing guest’s visit at center, etc.
-	Search/generate new contacts and bridge partnership,
-	Support in local fundraising projects/campaigns.

*	Internship placement:
-	Manage to place students for four-month full-time internship 
-	Manage internship follow-up with students and companies
-	Coordinate internship tutorship program
-	Follow up with students’ supervisor about their internship progress
-	Manage to conduct the survey with companies

*	Job placement:
-	Manage to place students for full-time job 
-	Manage employments follow-up with students
-	Event Supports
•	Organize or support other departments for local events (Career Forum, BarCamp, 
Graduation ceremony, etc.)
•	Liaise with vendors, exhibitors, and stakeholders during the event planning process to ensure everything is in order.
•	Manage all event set-up, tear down, and follow-up processes.
•	Maintain event budgets.

* Others:
-  Take part in external relations plan and initiatives,
-	Participate in yearly/monthly planning input,
-	Participate in Knowledge management (update our drives and tools),
-	Organize, maintain and manage contact lists using Sales Force,
-	Participate in PNC social mission, student selection, and virtual company,
-	Support project teams and other tasks assigned by the Manager. 

* To fulfill these objectives and carry out its tasks, the External Relations Officer will get support from the External Relations team.
Job Requirement:
* SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
-	Bachelor’s degree in business, sales, or marketing.  
-	1 year experience of successful sales closing or fundraising. 
-	Good knowledge and ability in prospecting, sales closing, and fundraising is highly preferred.  
- Very good in communication, and confident in speaking with new people. 
-   Good at English writing and speaking skills
-	Willingness to work in NGO environment/sensibility to social development problematic
-	Able to self-train quickly to General IT Knowledge and IT situation in Cambodia
-	Proficient in Microsoft Office: Excel, Word, PowerPoint, 

* STATUS AND CONDITIONS
-	Multicultural team setting (Khmer, French)
-	Salary negotiated upon experience, paid leaves. 
-	Start Date beginning of November (or earlier)

*  CONTACT – HOW TO APPLY:
- Interested individuals are invited to submit cover letter and CV to email below before 31th ,December, 2022. Telephone: 023 99 55 00

* Passerelles numériques Cambodia
- Address : BP 511 St. 371 Phum Tropeang, Chhuk (Borey Sorla), Sangkat Tek Thla, Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh
- E-mail : jobs.cambodia@passerellesnumeriques.org
- Website : www.passerellesnumeriques.org

Job Description:
We are looking for Java Developer to test and report software errors and bugs built from a web-based application.

If coding in software development in Java is your passion, then this announcement is made for you.

•	Develop and maintain new as well as existing features on a multitude of microservices
•	Produce secure and clean code that is stable, consistent, and highly maintainable
•	Ensure the best possible performance and responsiveness of the applications
•	Based on the specification, analyze the business and technical requirements
•	Participate in designing the component architecture adapted to the requirements
•	Analyze and help improve the code from a security perspective
•	Work with a team to expand everyone’s skill set
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science or related discipline
Working Experiences
•	2+ years of professional experience in developing and maintaining Java Applications
Specific Skills
•	Demonstrable experience in Java, REST/SOAP API, J2E, Spring ecosystems
•	Demonstrable experience in Web development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS)
•	Proficiency in problem solving and analysis
•	Knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and software engineering principles
•	Comprehensive knowledge of debugging and performance benchmarking
•	Comprehensive understanding of TCP/lP-based communication protocols
•	Knowledge of best practices in software security
•	Experience with writing reusable Java libraries
•	Familiar with relational database (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
•	Proficiency in English
** Benefits:
•	Good salary
•	Local and international short-course training (e.g., Singapore, France, etc.)
•	English course training
•	18 days of paid annual leave per year
•	NSSF insurance
•	Bonus for the Khmer New Year
•	A gift for a baby delivered
•	Leave for a wedding celebration
•	Annual party
•	A small party every Friday
•	Good working environment
•	Free coffee
•	Other bonuses
**  Conditions:
•	Working days: Monday–Friday (weekend off)
•	Working hours: 8:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.
•	1 hour and 30 minutes (for lunch)

job title: Store Supervisor (CCOO Brand-Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall)
position: Store Supervisor (CCOO Brand-Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall)
Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall N/A

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Pin Samnieng (Ms.)  077 888 954 / 010 857 525  recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 077 888 954 / 010 857 525

Job Description: Support superior in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources• Conduct market situation analysis and market research to support the development of marketing strategies• Conduct financial feasibility studies of advertising and promotional activities to ensure alignment with profit objectives• Analyze and compare costs associated with advertising and promotional activates• Track and update marketing plans and execution status• Prepare all operational briefs and documents for the performance review meetings with clients• Gather general market trends, market share and competitive information as guidance in gauging effectiveness of marketing activities• Coordinate and communicate all planned activities to all operational departments and Business Units• Establish close business relationships with media, advertising agents and industry players• Co work with respective trade channel for promotional Mechanism, instore display and POSM.• Other tasks assigned by immediate manager
Job Requirement: • Demonstrate strong understanding of clients' industry/business/products• Demonstrate basic knowledge on principles and methods of marketing strategy, advertising and promotion• Demonstrate basic knowledge on media production, communication and dissemination techniques and methods• Strong analytical background and knowledge of statistical analysis methods• Demonstrate appreciation and respect for cultural sensitivities especially in cross-country/-cultural interactions• Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken• Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)- Minimum 2 years in Marketing field.- Preferable someone with social media management background or marketing communication.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information Hok Rozanak HR Manager 093200278 jobs.kh@dksh.com Phnom Penh No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 093200278

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

job title: Specialist, IT & Digital Risk Management - 01 post.
position: Specialist, IT & Digital Risk Management - 01 post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “Specialist, IT & Digital Risk Management” position is responsible for planning organizing and leading of the functional of the IT risk management to ensuring all IT and Digital risk that are relevant to/or impact Hattha have been proactive addressed and identified at the early stage and managed. The role will assist the Deputy/Head of Operational Risk and Fraud Management Department to make clear to all staffs to understand on how to manage IT and Digital risk. This role also plays a key function to deliver of IT & Digital Risk Management agenda and activities with the relevant stakeholder in the Hattha.Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Develop and update IT & Digital Risk Management policy..Develop and update IT & Digital Risk Management procedure..Involve with UAT and risk assessment with new/change system before launching..Perform IT & Digital risk identification, tracking of risk and risk mitigation, Involve with DRP Testing..Develop and provide training to all staff to build IT risk culture..Assist operational risk and fraud management unit to develop system to implement in OFM..Coordinate of BCP testing by annually with critical function and Operational risk team..Assist Head of department to develop report in system to use in OFM..Perform additional tasks and any duties as required by Head of Operational Risk and Fraud Management Department..Suggest any recommendation or solutions for IT risk mitigation..Prepare monthly/quarterly report of OFM to EXCOM and BOD.Perform other task as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: .BBA or MBA degree in the field of Information Technology, financial banking, Business Management or Economics or another related field..Understanding of IT & Digital risk management/ measurement techniques..Highly acquainted with computer system and program such as MS. Word/Excel, and core banking system..Excellent command Khmer and English..Excellent analytical, problem solving, communication skill, and relationship skill..Understanding of financial/banking business operation..Working experience in different areas of the financial institution or bank..Work experience in different areas of the institution or bank at least 3 years related to Banks, Financial Institutions..Experience in field of IT risk management, IT audit and compliance function would be an advantage..Demonstrable experience with developing or implementing IT risk management framework, including compliance and monitoring program or related field..Proven ability to work across different areas of IT risk management, compliance or related field..Working knowledge/understanding of IT risk management/measurement technique.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description: - Diagnosing and treating illnesses, medical conditions, and injuries.- Ordering, performing, and interpreting diagnostic tests.- Collecting, recording, and maintaining patients' information and histories.- Prescribing and administering treatments, therapies, medications, vaccinations, and other specialized medical care.- Explaining procedures and discussing test results or prescribed treatments with patients and family members.- Monitoring patients' conditions and progress.-  Directing, coordinating, consulting with, and referring patients to nurses, students, assistants, specialists, therapists, and other medical staff.Advising patients, parents, and guardians on diets, activities, hygiene, and disease prevention.Conducting research and remaining up to date on current trends, discoveries, and developments in the field.
Job Requirement: - Degree in medicine (essential).- Superb organizational and time management skills.- Excellent decision-making skills and communication.- Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.- Compassionate nature with the ability to make patients feel at ease.- Great management and leadership skills.- A caring and compassionate nature when working with children and their families.- Location : Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh - Salary rank : $1.5K-$2K- Industry : Medical Clinic

Job Description:
Job Descriptions 

-	Supervise the day to day operations of subordinate Warehouse staff
-	Monitor on Stock In & Out and make sure that there is no discrepancy 
-	Train staff to keep current with updated/ new process
-	Make sure that all materials in warehouse are proper arrangement and available stock for support to site operation
-	Make sure that team are understand all process and working flow for their daily implement
-	Perform the daily spot check items and monthly stock count
-	Prepare and submit daily report weekly report and monthly report
Job Requirement:
Requirement

-	Bachelor degree in Management, Finance, Business administration
-	Minimum 3 years experience related to warehouse operations
-	Experience in dealing with tight report deadline
-	Be able to manage and coach both junior / senior team under supervision
-	Good in using Ms. Office
-	Good in both writing and Speaking English
-	Exeperience in using any ERP system is more preferable

Job Description:
1. Buying the product: Contraction Site
- To buy all the materials by follow purchasing plan and per assign from manager
- Make sure all purchasing plan are met the deadline 
- Prepare purchasing documents both hardcopy and softcopy plus invoices after buying the materials is must 

2. Petty Cash Controlling 
- To ensure that all purchasing material has been followed the budget
- Prepare monthly petty cash report and submit to manager per deadline (25th of the month)
- Other tasks assign by manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree of Administration or any relevant field 
• At least 1-year experiences from related field 
• Experience from Construct is plus 
• Good English in communication 
• Able to use Ms. Office word and excel
• Good knowledge in Construction material
• Good in negation skills 
• Good communication and follow up skills 
• Good communication 
• Good interpersonal skills

Job Description:
1.    ធ្វើការសង្កេត និងពិនិត្យអំពីភាពខូចនៃម៉ាស៊ីនរបស់គ្រឿងចក្រដូចជា ការសឹករីករិល ភាពខ្សោយ មូហេតុជាក់លាក់ជាដើម
2.    ដឹកនាំកូនជាងជួសជុលម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់របស់គ្រឿងចក្រទៅតាមគោលដៅដែលបានកំណត់តាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែក
3.    ចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យគ្រឿងចក្រតាមការដ្ឋានដើម្បីច្បាស់ថា គ្រឿងចក្រទាំងនោះមានការទុកដាក់បានត្រឹមត្រូវ(កាត់បន្ថយភាពខូច)
4.    ធ្វើការផ្តល់ពត៌មានអំពីលទ្ធផលការងារជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃទៅប្រធានផ្នែក
ការងារថែរទាំគ្រឿងចក្រ
1.    ត្រូវធ្វើការថែរក្សារបរិក្ខានៃគ្រឿងចក្រ គ្រឿងជួសជុលអោយមានរបៀបរៀបរយ
2.    ត្រូវប្រាកដថា បរិក្ខាទាំងនោះមានសុវត្ថិភាព ដោយមិនទុកចោល ឫត្រូវភ្លៀង
3.     បិរក្ខាណាដែលអាចជួសជុលឡើងវិញបាន ត្រូវចេះរកវិធីក្នុងការកែច្នៃអោយប្រសើឡៀងវិញ
4.    ការងារផ្សេងទៀត ត្រូវបានចាត់ចែងតាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែក
Job Requirement:
- ធ្លាប់ជួសជុលគ្រឿងម៉ាស៊ីន និងប៉ះកង់គ្រឿងចក្រយ៉ាងតិច 2 ឆ្នាំ
- មានបច្ចេកទេសក្នុងការជុសជុល អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងតាមស្តង់ដា
- អាចអាន និងសសេរភាសារខ្មែរបាន 
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
- ពូកែខាងជំនាញដឹកនាំ
- ខិតខំធ្វើការនិងធ្វើការជាក្រុមបានល្អ
- ភាពបត់បែននិងភាពសម្របខ្លួនតាមកាលៈទេសៈ
- ចេះដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាល្អ
- អាចបត់បែនតាមស្ថានការក្រុមហ៊ុន

Job Description:
1.	Prepare PO and send to supplier 
-	Arrange PO after get MRP/PR from Site/WH dept. 
-	Make sure All PO got approved from Management before send to supplier
-	Completed PO must include MRP/PR, Comparison price (Min.3 suppliers), Quotation

2.	Monitor/Follow up Delivery Plan to Site/WH
-	Delivery schedule and packing list/PO without price must be informed before arrived date to Site/Warehouse
-	Manage schedule delivery match requested date from requester
-	Any missing between order and actual arrived, must check and solve after got information from site/warehouse
-	All products are good quality and accuracy quantity.
3.	Petty Cash
-	Control petty cash for purchasing material as required
-	Prepare monthly petty cash report to manager 

4.	 Reporting
-	Purchasing Tracking Report update must in weekly (by Saturday) and monthly (by 1st of following month).
-	Report is included PR Vs. PO Vs. Receipt Vs. Invoice and Noted.
-	Reconcile documents from suppliers to prevent missing and closing documents for any transactions related to account dept. as monthly. 
-	Other tasks assign by supervisor /manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in Administration or any relevant field 
• Over 1 year Purchase dept and Inventory control 
• English Language
• MS Office & Email
• ERP system
• Knowledge in Construction material
• Negotiate price 
• Reporting
• Good in communication and interpersonal skills
• Effective team and relationship building

job title: Sales System Operation and Science Specialist
position: Sales System Operation and Science Specialist
Job Description:
Operation:
- Master Data, Promotion and Pricing, KPIs setup in system
- Level-1 support to commercial (sales) systems, provide functional support to users
- Preparing commercial (sales) system user functional manual
- Perform timely facts delivery with aligned accuracy level on sales master data governance, all reports and dashboards. (i.e. Distributors master, customer master, contract master, sales structure, promotion…) 
- Perform compliance standard operation procedure service level agreement timely/properly follow charter of approval.
- Communicate and drive changes, if necessary, to improve data collection productivity.
- Perform quality management and administrate functional set up on master data, outlets, distributors, sales journey route plan, sales call card, promotion, and reporting on a day-to-day basis.
- Perform other tasks related to the position and assigned by manager

Analytical:
- Support sales initiative business cases study and process of execution.
- Perform data sanity checks from trade and challenging the answer the trade in the purpose to ensure quality of data and correct execution.
- Liaise business requirement, change request, system issue between user and technical IT to troubleshoot problem or efficiency improvement.

Communication:
- Present actionable information and insights to team members and management.
- Answer questions about delivered results/ reports through with strong facts and discipline.

Innovation:
- Continuously develop and present innovative ideas based on data driven approach in order to improve current business practices
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Accounting, Finance, Economics, or similar.
- Advance in Microsoft Excel.
- Experience in Microsoft Office applications (Power BI, office 365, Powerpoint, Internet and email)
- ERP functional support (Account receivable, Production, Sales marketing…)
- Good Command of English both written and spoken.
- As part of your job scope, you may be required to travel to provinces or cities that may happen from time to time
- Creative and innovative problem-solving skills
- Team oriented, collaborative, diplomatic, and flexible style, with the ability to tailor data driven results to various audience levels
- Intellectual curiosity and a passion for data and analytics
- Strong desire to take initiative; ability to deal with ambiguity and competing objectives

Purpose of the position:
Responsible for effective and efficient implementation of FIT, overall and specified promotions in individual designated outlets by ensuring all activities are properly carried out according to the Quality, Availability, Affordability and Perfect Execution (QAAP) standards 

Core Responsibilities:
- Proactively implement the 6 steps call 
- Effectively and efficiently implementing the Picture of Success (PicOS)  
- Regularly visiting customers according to Journey Route Plan generated from current available support system - SFA and provide excellent sales and customer service, and report any change of customers 
- Continuously and gradually achieving monthly sales target set 
- Ensure healthy of all product range in all outlets of designated area 
- Establish, maintain and develop positive relationships with all outlets 
- Expand new business opportunities through: 
  1. Opening of new outlets within the designated area of coverage 
  2. Identifying, initiating and selling-in of consumer promotions  
  3. Ensuring selling-out of Cambrew’s products/brands from the outlets 
  4. Creating exclusive outlets
- Share best practice and key success/failure learning to the team
Job Requirement:
- Minimum Secondary School/Certificate holders 
- Minimum 1 to 2 years of experience in selling FMCG products 
- Passionate and commitment in achieving results 
- Enthusiastic, energetic and willing to work under pressure and long hours with minimum supervision 
- Integrity, Trustworthy and reliable 
- Good communication skills
Basic knowledge and understanding of the industry, market, competitors, and customers 
- Basic knowledge in assigned territories 
- Good communication and negotiation skills 
- Basic research and analytical skills 
- Proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)

Job Description:
• Develops CSD/QSR channel marketing programs in line with IAPs targeted to channels and CSD/ED product categories to increase brand awareness and grow & sales
• Development of multi touchpoint shopper marketing initiatives and campaigns based on shopper insight and strong understanding of channel strategy. 
• Working closely with the sales and CSD/ED brand marketing team to ensure that CSD/QSR channel marketing strategies are aligned with objectives and targets with evaluation of its effectiveness.
• Develops promotion, activation and visibility plans with defined calendar by brand and channel 
• Develop consumer promotion mechanics, execute, monitor, and evaluate its effectiveness in the CSD/QSR Channels
• Manage execution of CSD/QSR channel marketing activity plan with pre & post performance evaluation
• Develop and monitor execution of PICOS strategy in the CSD/QSR Channels, get alignment from relevant stakeholders, lead the roll-out and implementation
• Provide input for new POSM development, control its deployment in the CSD/QSR channels
• Develops creative briefs for programs and publications working with external agencies
• Frequent communication with teams to support data collection, issue resolution and requests
• On time submission of CSD/QSR monthly sales and marketing activity plan and report  
• People Development through coaching and succession planning
Job Requirement:
• Minimum bachelor’s degree in marketing, Business Administration, or its equivalent
• Minimum of 5 years’ experience in Trade Marketing from FMCG/F&B, especially CSD/ED industry
• Minimum 2 years of people management
• Good written and spoken English
• Computer literate – MS Tools (PP, Excel & Word Excellent written and verbal communication skills – English & Khmer Language
• Good interpersonal skills and problem-solving skill 
• Good analytical skills with a problem-solving attitude

Job Description:
1. Develop and implement marketing strategy to meet established sales and market shares target. 

2. Responsible for leading, developing and implementing: the brand strategy, market research, communication strategy, media planning and promotion strategy.

3. Responsible for driving and developing marketing campaign for the brands, managing brand’s profitability and A&P budgeting, growing  brand volume share growth  and tracking all key brand health tracking indicators.

4. Responsible for brand communications that cover ATL national campaigns and new brand visual for through-the-line development and channel visibility 

5. Responsible for key relations with ATL, Media, Digital and PR agencies, external media partners and key internal stakeholders within organization.  Main ATL focus is on Print, TV, Cinema, Radio, Outdoor, and Digital. 

6. Research and analyze the marketplace and target consumer to proactively respond to changing customer demands, market trends and gain insights on the consumer 

7. Manage day-to-day activities associated to all marketing efforts, including project management, creative development, cross-functional implementation, campaign tracking and reporting as necessary as related to brand development and performance 

8. Work closely with Trade Marketing and Sales teams to drive integration and execution of plans 

9. Be the brand advocate through promoting and educating the internal audience on the brand initiatives, programs, values, attributes, etc.
Job Requirement:
- At least, a  Bachelor Degree holder from recognized university 
- At least 5 years experience in brand management, preferably from the F&B / Beverage / FMCG industry 
- Excellent communication skills (interpersonal / presentation) 
- Strong project management skills 
- Strong analytical skill 
- Excellent business acumen, good understanding of the market and all trade sectors 
- Good work ethics, proven success track record in brand development

Job Description:
• Plan scheduled and unscheduled audits within assigned Region and Accounts.
• Conduct unbiased sales audit on FIT KPI’s related to Picture of Success’s 5Ps (Product, Promotion, Price, Perfect Serve & Placement)
• Analyst, generate and submit Weekly 5P report with significant insights and gaps in execution.
• Perform Monthly FIT review with Regional Sales Team and Develop FIT Test or Simulation to gauge and improve understanding on PICOS.
• Random visit to Brand Promoter Outlets to monitor Performance of Brand Promoters
• Random visit to Distributor warehouse to monitor warehouse compliance policy and highlight Distributor Value Chain issues i.e. Delivery, FG Condition from trade 
• Conduct In-Field Coaching as part of Sales On-boarding Process focusing on PICOS execution.
• Perform daily In Field Coaching for Sales Team to ensure align towards company’s Sales targets.
• Improve training effectiveness by developing new approaches and techniques, integrated with routine job functions.
• Builds and maintains positive relationships with stakeholders
• Communicates professionally (both verbally and electronically) with stakeholders
• Systematic Planning of Outlet Coverage and Training schedule with vigorous tracking of FIT Score.
Job Requirement:
• Minimum 3 years’ work experience in FMCG industry. 
• Professional background in Sales or Marketing is preferred. 
• Assertive, high self-confident and matured individual with strong self-discipline.
• Expert user in Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel, Word and Outlook.
• Strong verbal and written communications skills (Khmer and English).
• Numerate and analytical skills.
• SFA and DMS (sales tools) experience preferred.

Job Description:
Purpose of the position:
The Technicians most important task is to ensure that the installations are made professionally and to our customer’s satisfaction, that the equipment are serviced at regular, pre-determined intervals by a professional and dedicated team of technicians. The overall goal of the Technical team, under the leadership of the National Technical Service Manager is to ensure that every single Carlsberg Cambodia Drink served is fresh and meets the consumers’ expectations.

Core Responsibilities:
- Train customers in outlet training module for customers (pouring perfect training, troubleshooting etc.) 
- Performing and using the procedures on installation, sanitation, and trouble shooting. 
- Report to NTSM when ST has to go to outlets and travel for the service of outlet complain and after his return from visit. 
- Need to follow the detail instructions by NTSM/TSM/TSs
  1) Drink system installation and best Practices 
  2) Fault Finding trouble shooting 
  3) Sanitation service by routine. 
  4) Service and maintenance in outlet/store 
   - At sanitation time and in store, cleaning of equipment in a hygienic way 
   - Cleaning all the elements of the counters, drip tray, side panels of cooler and pythons 
   in a mild soap solution, then drying everything with a clean cloth. This also includes 
   ensuring that the cooler has full ventilation capacity and the condenser is not full of 
   dust. Likewise for post mix equipment. 
    - Cleaning and polishing of equipment upon return from outlet or event.
- To achieve a quality and efficiency KPI model for the Technicians by Manager.
Key Tasks Operations 
- Report for progress 
- Feedback information of the market to the immediate supervisor.
Job Requirement:
- Engineering degree 
- Fair in English Language 
- 1 yrs relevant technical experience, ideally in FMCG/beer environment, 
Effective, positive and energetic attitude 
- Ability to communicate clearly 
- Team-orientation and ability to implement the team work 
- Action-oriented, persistent and result oriented 
- Solid organizing skills
- Driving License (A)

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
